(Sorry if this is inaccurate, at my computer class at school and I'm 
listening to the original version of "Relax" and the new version by 
Powerman 5000, from the Zoolander movie starring Ben Stiller & Will 
Ferrel.  It's awesome, the song and the movie I mean...hit me, hit 
me, with those laser beams!)

The Protectobots:


Would've said sorry after noticing the high-pressured water hit 
Prowl, but this was a battle and he didn't feel taking the time to 
say sorry was necessary.  His cannon-hose readjusted, the water 
following Megatron in an attempt to hit his knees.

Groove stood up, a hand holding his head, the other hanging at his 
side with its photon pistol.  He tried to regain his footing, a 
little shook up from the hard impact.

"Ugh..." Groove said, his vision becoming less blurry every second.

(Soundwave noticed the insults?  Wouldn't he have heard the chopper's 
loud engine and swirling blades long before they arrived? :)

The apache flew overhead the battle, making a U-turn in the air, 
arming a rocket tube as Blades began a second pass against the 
Decepticons.  "You may have got lucky," he yelled, "but your luck is 
running out!"

After scrutinizng the battlefield with his optics and advanced 
sensors, Streetwise raised his photon pistol and fired off three 
blasts at Spasstik while charging him.  (He's just running towards 
him, not tackling/smashing into)

First Aid, Protectobot medic, just hung back away from the battle, 
hoping no one, other than the enemy, got hurt to bad.
